form.PN:
Besedo
wind
pri pomenih od 1 do 5 izgovarjamo
/w*Ind/
, pri pomenih od 6 do 8 in frazni glagol pa
/w*a*Ind/
.
form.IN:
Pri 3. pomenu je oblika za pretekli in pretekli deležnik
winded
.

sense.def:
A wind
je zračni tok, ki se pomika nad zemeljsko površino.

seg.quote: There was a fierce wind blowing.

sense.def:
One's wind
je človekova sposobnost, da z lahkoto diha.

seg.quote: I had to stop and regain my wind.

sense.def:
To be winded by something
pomeni kratek čas imeti težave z dihanjem, na primer zaradi udarca.

Na glasbilo, ki je
wind
, igramo tako, da pihamo vanj ali čezenj; v to skupino glasbil sodita na primer trobenta ali flavta.

To get wind of something
pomeni slišati za nekaj;

seg.quote: He somehow got wind of the party and managed to get himself invited.

sense.def:
Kadar cesta ali reka
winds somewhere
, gre v določeno smer s številnimi ovinki.

seg.quote: The river winds through the town.
...the winding road leading to the Castle.

sense.def:
To wind something round something else
pomeni nekaj večkrat oviti okoli nečesa drugega.

To wind a clock or watch
pomeni omogočiti delovanje zapestne ali kake druge ure, tako da obrnemo gumb, ključ ali ročico.

Kadar neka dejavnost ali posel
is wound up
, je končana ali sklenjena.

seg.quote: Four years later the company was wound up.
